categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Force-sensitive individual served as the Padawan of Jedi Master Poli Dapatian during his time on the Jedi High Council. Before being selected as Dapatian's Padawan, the individual had been one of Qui-Gon Jinn's crèche-mates.
